title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Pasta
description: A quick and delicious pasta dish with a rich creamy sauce, perfect for a weeknight dinner.

instructions.step: Boil the pasta in salted water according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat and sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in parmesan cheese until melted.
Toss the cooked pasta in the sauce until fully coated.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve warm.

title: Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes
description: Classic American breakfast staples made fluffy, light, and bursting with fresh blueberries.

instructions.step: Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, mix milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in blueberries gently.
Pour batter onto a hot, greased griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Classic Beef Smashburger
description: Juicy beef patties smashed crispy on the edges, topped with melted cheddar and fresh veggies.

instructions.step: Form ground beef into loose balls and season generously.
Heat a cast-iron skillet to high heat.
Place beef balls on skillet and smash flat with a spatula.
Cook for 2-3 minutes, flip, add cheese, and cook for another minute.
Assemble on toasted brioche buns with veggies.

title: Healthy Quinoa Salad Bowl
description: A refreshing and nutritious salad packed with protein-rich quinoa, avocados, and lime dressing.

instructions.step: Rinse quinoa and cook in boiling water for 15 minutes.
Let the quinoa cool to room temperature.
Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Whisk olive oil, lime juice, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
Combine everything in a large bowl and toss well.

title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
description: Mexican street-style tacos with marinated chicken, salsa, and lime.

instructions.step: Marinate diced chicken with chili powder, cumin, and salt.
Sear chicken in a hot pan until fully cooked and slightly charred.
Warm the corn tortillas on a dry skillet.
Fill tortillas with chicken, onions, and cilantro.
Top with salsa verde and a squeeze of lime.

title: Decadent Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich individual chocolate cakes with a gooey molten center.

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F) and grease ramekins.
Melt butter and chocolate together in a double boiler.
Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold chocolate mixture and flour into the eggs gently.
Bake for 12 minutes until sides are firm but center is soft.

title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Pasta
description: A quick and comforting pasta dish coated in a velvety garlic and cheese sauce.

instructions.step: Boil pasta in salted water according to package directions.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat and sauté garlic.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer for 3 minutes to thicken.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Toss cooked pasta in the sauce and garnish with parsley.

title: Classic Fluffy Pancakes
description: Golden, airy pancakes served perfectly with syrup and fresh berries.

instructions.step: Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter in a separate bowl.
Pour wet ingredients into dry and mix until just combined.
Pour batter onto a hot, greased griddle.
Flip when bubbles appear and cook until golden brown.

title: Fresh Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing Italian salad featuring ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

instructions.step: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella into thick rounds.
Arrange slices on a platter, alternating tomato and cheese.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the layers.
Drizzle generously with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Sprinkle with salt and freshly cracked pepper before serving.
